message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Would you be willing to consider $17,000? That feels like a fairer compromise.
I appreciate your understanding, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my absolute maximum. Can you meet me there?
